title: Base Schema for Dockerfile Variables in Shoc Platform

ImageTag.description: A valid Docker image tag (letters, numbers, ., _, or -).

AlpinePackageName.description: A valid Alpine package name (lowercase letters, numbers, ., or -).

items.description: Entrypoint commands must be valid paths or binaries without special characters.

EntrypointArray.description: An array of entrypoint commands (must be valid binaries or paths).
